Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Dissertation \Dis`ser*ta"tion\, n. [L. dissertatio: cf. F. dissertation.] A formal or elaborate argumentative discourse, oral or written; a disquisition; an essay; a discussion; as, Dissertations on the Prophecies. [1913 Webster]
dissertation n : a treatise advancing a new point of view resulting from research; usually a requirement for an advanced academic degree [syn: {thesis}]
